title: Chelsea Handler sets the record straight on her feud with Jennifer Aniston
text:
Contrary to rumours, Chelsea Handler and Jennifer Aniston's friendship is rock solid.

On Thursday's episode of The Project, guest host Katie 'Monty' Dimond fawned over Jennifer and asked the 44-year-old comedian if they were still mates.

'We are! We are! Don't read those magazines! Don't believe any of it!' Chelsea replied. 'We're friends. Don't worry... I love Jen.'

'Don't believe any of it!' Chelsea Handler (left) set the record straight on her so-called feud with Jennifer Aniston during an appearance on The Project on Thursday

Chelsea and Jennifer, 50, first became mates after the former Friends star appeared on her late-night talk show Chelsea Lately.

According to Radar Online, their relationship went pear-shaped when Jennifer married her second husband Justin Theroux in 2015.

The two women reportedly buried the hatchet in February this year when Jennifer invited Chelsea to her star-studded 50th birthday party.

Claims: According to Radar Online, Chelsea and Jennifer's relationship went pear-shaped when the Friends star married her second husband Justin Theroux in 2015. Pictured in 2011

Meanwhile, it has been an eventful week for Chelsea.

On Wednesday, she shared a cheeky photo to Instagram of her bare bottom while in Hobart, Tasmania.

Just days earlier, she uploaded another snap of herself exposing her bare breasts in the street.

Sun's out, bums out! On Wednesday, Chelsea shared a cheeky photo to Instagram of her bare bottom while in Hobart, Tasmania

Her nipples were covered by orange emojis, meaning she wouldn't face disciplinary action from Instagram.

Chelsea is currently in Australia on her Life Will Be the Death of Me tour, which is based on her best-selling memoir of the same name.

It was recently announced the book will be turned into a television series.
description: Contrary to rumours,  Chelsea Handler and Jennifer Aniston's friendship is rock solid.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
